context: A security incident was reported involving Julian Burke (IT director) who sent a replication request to VNEVADO-DC from the machine VNEVADO-Win10V, which is suspected to be a DCSync attack. During the investigation, it was found that Ethan Brooks (Account Executive) on the same machine enumerated SMB sessions on VNEVADO-DC to retrieve IP addresses of 2 accounts. Ultimately, there was a detection of a command line execution of a known malicious credential theft tool that indicated an intent to dump users' credentials, keys, and plain-text passwords.
question: What is the identifier (Name) of the account from the final alert associated with the execution of the malicious credential theft tool?
solution_steps: Julian Burke (IT director) on host `VNEVADO-Win10V` sent 1 replication request to `VNEVADO-DC`, indicating a suspected DCSync attack.

Ethan Brooks (Account Executive) on host `VNEVADO-Win10V` enumerated SMB sessions on `VNEVADO-DC`, retrieving recent IP addresses of 2 accounts. The AadUserId associated with this activity is `1d94aaf6-efe6-4e76-ad56-ffd7d1257bc1`.
A malicious credential theft tool execution was detected with the intent to dump users' credentials. The account linked to this activity is `tgs2z`.
